name: Varun Anand Singh
reknown: Everything Starts and ends with him
bio: I know him from School and in the past 7-8 years he was always there for me in Everything. Well he's taller than me(barely) , Likes cricket (watching only coz he just can't play) and Football , One of the best thing about him is his taste in music (It's great really) . Anyways he kinda have a quality only a few can really see (and i am one of them).  Moto : "Let Me Enjoy"

name: Satyam Gupta
reknown: One of the main reasons of my positivity
bio: If you know him you just know him ,There are no faces of this guy , he is the only guy i know who is able to hold his personality in this ever changing life . The guy with the best jokes , the guy with the best movies , the Gamer , the Supplier , he's all and he's the best . The best thing about him is that he has his own style and he doesn't compromise Moto: "Be Happy , don't care "

name: Prashant Kumar Mishra
reknown: Only Being with more idiocity than me

name: Shourya Pratap Singh Tomar
reknown: The one with my level of experiences
bio: The musical genius and the one with the most experiences...
